FileFormat.FormatDescription: 3MF is an XML-based data file format published by the 3MF Consortium for additive manufacturing (3D printing).
FileFormat.ProvenanceName: Digital Preservation Department / The National Archives
FileFormat.ProvenanceDescription:
This format can be identified via a container signature in DROID version 6 or later. The PRONOM database cannot currently represent container signatures.
http://3mf.io/what-is-3mf/3mf-specification/
